pages.text: Inscription Boxes are a new Mystery Box-like item that contains a random Inscription as a reward.
They can be found in bounties, $(l)Omega Boxes$(), and $(l)Dungeon Pedestals$(). They can contain normally unobtainable Inscriptions, as well as ones with 5 size instead of the normal 10!
You can combine 4 of any Inscriptions and a few ingredients from the vault to craft an Inscription Box as well, in case you'd like to roll the dice for a better one!
